quote.author: Jean Paul
quote.body: No rest is worth anything except the rest that is earned.

quote.author: Bruce Lee
quote.body: If you always put limits on everything you do, physical or anything else, it will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.

quote.author: Thomas Edison
quote.body: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.

quote.author: Confucius
quote.body: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.

quote.author: Jim Valvano
quote.body: Never give up! Failure and rejection are only the first step to succeeding.

quote.author: Anonymous
quote.body: Keep your goals out of reach, but not out of sight.

quote.author: Mike Ditka
quote.body: Before you can win, you have to believe you are worthy.

quote.author: Anonymous
quote.body: Success comes before work... only in the dictionary.

quote.author: Steve Michalik
quote.body: Train beyond the pain..and death is your only release

quote.author: Guy Cisternino
quote.body: To anyone that ever tells you that you can't do something - tell them to go f*** themselves.

quote.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote.body: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

quote.author: Buddha
quote.body: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.

quote.author: Nido Qubein
quote.body: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.

quote.author: Michael Jordan
quote.body: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.

quote.author: Hagrid
quote.body: You're a Wizard, Harry

quote.author: Yoda
quote.body: Do, or do not. There is no "try".

quote.author: President Merkin Muffley
quote.body: Gentlemen, you can't fight in here! This is the War Room.

quote.author: Darth Vader
quote.body: Luke, I am your father.

quote.author: Mitch Hedberg
quote.body: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.

quote.author: Sun Tzu
quote.body: Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.

quote.author: Voltaire
quote.body: The art of medicine consists in amusing the patient while nature cures the disease.
